name: InBlue - Global Style
description:
A Dark Blue global style ( for any website ), which gives you the opportunity to surf a clear white & rounded web and find a blue world made of  blue dreams.

Thanks to other user-stylers.

PsychedEric

( http://userstyles.org/styles/1761 why not using this also ? )
